name: Mean8 Convey
description:
Ha oh wow I actually forgot to put this up on my itch :O Alright let's just release it right now at 2AM! According to github I made this in october 2019, but I think the first prototype was made months before that. 

It is a variant of my puzzle game 'mean8', but this game is more open-ended and includes random elements. The goal is still to make an eight from the numbers that the conveyor belts spit out. Apparently this version is the easy one where undo kinda works but that's alright you might need the leeway.

The key in the game bar includes helpful tips and gifs, if you're not the explorey type you shouldn't feel any shame in just checking them right away. I certainly won't judge you ;) Access the hints menu by pressing H and the level select by pressing L.
